entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 10:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the evening. Ice pellets beginning near midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
